diagnosis.score_summary: The brand is suffering from acute schizophrenia, presenting as a pragmatic family staple on the website (Ancestral Cosmetics) and a luxury apothecary brand on the marketplace (Terra Lotus). While the core 'Natural' purpose remains intact, the execution across Positioning, Values, and Tone is completely disconnected, effectively creating two different companies.

truth_1.headline: Viral Proof vs. Ingredient Checklists
truth_1.gap_description: The WWW relies on 'Viral Results' (Social Proof) with 100,000+ transformations. The PDP relies on 'Formula Purity' (Safety) by listing what is absent. You are selling results on one channel and safety on the other.
truth_1.evidence: WWW: '100.000+ Skin Transformations' (The Fans) vs. PDP: 'Say good-bye to chemical filled moisturizers' (The List)
truth_1.why_matters: The customer doesn't know if they are buying a powerful fixer or a safe abstainer. Relying on 'Free-From' claims on Amazon dilutes the powerful 'Transformation' narrative established on the site.
truth_1.the_hard_choice: You are currently splitting your persuasion capital between 'It Works' and 'It's Safe.' You must choose: either flood the Amazon listing with the aggressive visual proof of the website to convert the desperate (Option A), or sanitize the website to focus on the 'Clean' ingredient list to capture the purist (Option B). You cannot win by being a viral sensation in one room and a quiet chemist in the other.

truth_2.headline: Family Staple vs. Luxury Apothecary
truth_2.gap_description: WWW positions the brand as a 'Gentle Giant'—a daily essential for the whole family. PDP positions it as a 'Clean Essentialist'—a polished investment piece. You are a commodity on your site and a luxury good on Amazon.
truth_2.evidence: WWW: 'Daily Essential' (2/5 Value) vs. PDP: 'Investment Piece' (4/5 Value)
truth_2.why_matters: This pricing and aesthetic disconnect creates price resistance. Customers seeing the 'Luxury' Amazon listing will feel the website product is lower quality, while website visitors will view the Amazon price as inflated.
truth_2.the_hard_choice: Your brand is suffering from class confusion. You must decide: either elevate the website experience to the 'Apothecary' standard of Amazon to justify a premium (Option A), or downgrade the Amazon aesthetic to the 'Family Utility' vibe of the site to drive volume (Option B). A product cannot be a precious jewel and a daily tool at the same time.

truth_3.headline: The Standard vs. The Cult
truth_3.gap_description: WWW signals 'The Pragmatist'—a smart, logical choice for efficacy. PDP signals 'The Purist'—an ethical choice for insiders. One is for everyone; the other is for the chosen few.
truth_3.evidence: WWW: 'The Smart Choice' (2/5 Motivation) vs. PDP: 'The Insider' (4/5 Tribal)
truth_3.why_matters: The 'Purist' signaling on Amazon alienates the mainstream buyer who just wants dry skin relief, limiting your TAM. Conversely, the 'Pragmatist' website bores the high-value 'Crunchy' demographic.
truth_3.the_hard_choice: You are caught between mass appeal and niche zealotry. The data demands a choice: either radicalize the website to match the 'Purist' exclusionary tone of Amazon (Option A), or soften the Amazon listing to welcome the 'Pragmatist' mass market (Option B). You can lead a cult or a category, but not both.

truth_4.headline: The Heat Is Rising
truth_4.gap_description: Both channels align on 'Earthy Organic,' but PDP pushes the Visual Temperature to 5/5 (Hot) compared to WWW's 4/5. The marketplace is slightly more sensory and 'Spa' than the 'Farm' vibe of the site.
truth_4.why_matters: This is a subtle drift from 'Heritage' to 'Sensory.' If the Amazon listing becomes too aesthetic, it risks losing the grounded, raw authority that the 'Ancestral' name implies.
truth_4.the_hard_choice: Your Amazon visuals are becoming more seductive than your brand truth. You face a nuanced choice: either upgrade the website photography to match this higher sensory standard (Option A), or pull back the Amazon aesthetic to the rougher, 'Farm' reality (Option B). Beauty converts, but grit builds trust.

truth_5.headline: The Unshakable Source
truth_5.gap_description: Despite the chaos, both channels score 100% alignment on Purpose ('The Harmonizer') and Messaging ('The Alchemist'). The core narrative of 'Raw Nature' fixing problems is identical and powerful.
truth_5.evidence: Authority Origin: Both 5/5 (Raw Nature). Messaging: Both 'The Alchemist'.
truth_5.why_matters: This is the anchor holding the fragmented brand together. The market clearly resonates with the 'Nature as Healer' story, regardless of the channel contradictions.
truth_5.the_hard_choice: You have accidental consistency in your core story, which is rare. The choice is strategic: either continue to let the channels drift visually while relying on this narrative anchor (Option A), or ruthlessly align all other markers to this 'Harmonizer' truth to multiply its power (Option B). A great story can survive bad branding, but it shouldn't have to.

marker_1.so_what: Both channels agree the brand exists to restore balance using raw nature.

marker_2.so_what: WWW fights a global industry war; PDP solves individual skin problems.

marker_3.so_what: WWW values the story of the process; PDP values the safety of the ingredient list.

marker_4.so_what: The website sells a daily utility; Amazon sells a premium investment.

marker_5.so_what: WWW is distant and professional; PDP is affectionate and sophisticated.

marker_6.so_what: Both are Philosophers, but WWW leads with Wisdom (Sage) while PDP leads with Purity (Innocent).

marker_7.so_what: The website is dry and efficient; the Amazon listing is helpful and encouraging.

marker_8.so_what: Strong visual consistency, though PDP leans slightly more into sensory warmth.

marker_9.so_what: Both channels successfully romanticize the raw ingredients.

marker_10.so_what: WWW tells a story of survival and cure; PDP tells a story of harvest and craft.

marker_11.so_what: WWW uses results-based social proof; PDP uses fear-based ingredient logic.

marker_12.so_what: WWW acts as a category leader; PDP acts as a niche problem solver.

marker_13.so_what: Both educate, but PDP is more academic and textbook-focused.

marker_14.so_what: Excellent alignment on the promise of biological repair.

marker_15.so_what: Both channels promise internal safety and reassurance.

marker_16.so_what: WWW appeals to common sense; PDP appeals to ethical superiority.

marker_17.so_what: WWW invites you to a club; PDP invites you to separate from the masses.
